subtitle: A light finish to a meal.

method.text: In a pan, dissolve the sugar in the wine over a gentle heat for 3-5 min. Add the mint leaves. Bring to the boil. Remove from the heat.
Add the raspberries. Leave to stand for 1 hour.
Remove and discard the mint leaves. Pour the mixture into a food processor and blend until smooth.
Pour the cooled mixture through a sieve to remove the raspberry pips. Put the mixture into a freezer proof container. Freeze until half frozen.
Beat the half frozen sorbet. Fold the egg white into the mixture and re-freeze until frozen.

title: Raspberry wine sorbet
